```{r, include=F}
library(ggplot2)
library(pander)

load('work/transform.Rdata')

```

Some fancy table
----------------


```{r}
pander(
	   with(trans.data, ftable(class, gender, survived)),
	   caption="a pretty table of survival")
```

And a plot
----------

```{r, fig.capture="some plot"}
ggplot(trans.data, mapping = aes(x=embarked, y=age, colour=survived)) +
	   geom_boxplot()
```
